greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k)=n/k + k - 1 if n mod k = 0; otherwise T(n,k)=0 (1<=k<=n).
comment: Row sums = A129235: (1, 4, 6, 11, 10, 20, 14,...). Moebius transform of A129234 = A129236. Inverse Moebius transform of A129234 = A129237.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: T:=proc(n,k) if n mod k = 0 then n/k+k-1 else 0 fi end: for n from 1 to 16 do seq(T(n,k),k=1..n) od; # yields sequence in triangular form - _Emeric Deutsch_, Apr 17 2007
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 05 2007
